segments.text: Excuse me , Professor , I have a problem and need to leave class early .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you have to leave early ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you make it up by attending my other section this week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's all taken care of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you leaving right away or can you stay for a few more minutes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can stay a few more minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but please make sure that you get all of your make-up work completed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Professor . I've got it covered !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go do what you have to do , but make sure it doesn't happen again .
segments.speaker: S2
